review_title: Lutheran Hospice (Upstate) is an Awesome Team
pros: Lutheran Hospice of the Upstate has a great team of professionals with a passion for patient care! They are a Faith-based, non-profit ministry--making for a patient centered work environment. This is an awesome team to work with and I look forward to future years of service.
cons: No cons so far. Great experience.

job_title: Certified Nursing Assistant CNA in Inman, SC
pros: Decent enough pay for a CNA

job_title: Anonymous Employee in White Rock, SC
pros: LHSC is a faith based, mission focused organization that values it's employees and it's clients.  The organization offers excellent benefits, work environments and is creating a culture of empowerment through the the Five to Thrive Program.  This year almost 86% of the employees who participated in the annual employee survey reoommended Lutheran Homes as a good place to work.
cons: Lutheran Homes is not perfect but few organizations are. What is important is that the management is committed to listening to the employees and using that feedback to improve the culture and conditions for all.

pros:
Good place to start resume and career at 
Usual good fellowship between employees 
Rice Estate facility is very well organized and well maintained. 
Decent salary and benefits.
cons:
Raises do usually occur annually but due to nature of the company its usually just a mere 1%. 
Major disconnect in reality between management and employees. 
Payroll often makes mistakes on paychecks and takes a few days to correct. 
Heritage at Lowman facility is disorganized and hires anyone off the street apparently. Even residents are very unhappy.

pros: Thrilled to have new leadership!  Someone who is finally available and someone who is smart and caring.  What a difference to have someone that is competent and honest.
cons: wish we could sell our paid leave in order to receive the money for time earned

pros: I find this to be a dynamic company that is cutting edge for residential and healthcare services. They truly live the mission, they care about their residents, patients and clients as well as the employees. As an employee I feel valued and know that my work makes a difference in  many lives.
cons: I can not think of any cons

review_title: Great pay but the company"s mangers do not stand by the policies.
pros: Great pay and plenty of full time positions. Also great outer appearance and landscaping.
cons: Limit the craziness with employees certain employees get away with too much.

pros: Always acknowledging special holidays to their employees with gestures .
cons: Always short staffed and upper management never shows concern to things that can be done to show their dedication to teamwork and to help staff have pleasure in working for the company under the management.

review_title: Management was good and they take care of employees.
job_title: Medical Billing Specialist in Irmo, SC
pros: Yearly raises were always adequate.  If you work hard and prove yourself promotion will be given.
cons: First of the month you are working 50 to 60 hours weekly due to deadlines.

pros: Cares about employees, takes excellent care of residents has great managers and leaders.
cons: Would be nice to have another floating Holiday at Easter
